name: ShieldConfiguration.Label
desc: The appearance of text labels within a shield.

items.name: init(text: String, color: UIColor)
items.desc: Creates a shield label with the provided text and color.

items.name: let color: UIColor
items.desc: The color of the text on a shield.

items.name: let text: String
items.desc: The text of the label on a shield.
